snippet: Dr. Heffner guided Brown University during the late 1960s, when students protested against the Vietnam War and blacks strived for racial equality and greater acceptance.
abstract: Ray L Heffner, president of Brown University in the late 1960s, dies at age 87.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Heffner guided Brown University during the late 1960s, when students protested against the Vietnam War and blacks strived for racial equality and greater acceptance.

headline.seo: Ray L. Heffner, President at Brown University, Dies at 87
headline.main: Ray L. Heffner, Often-‘Besieged’ University President, Dies at 87
headline.print_headline:
Ray L. Heffner, 87, President
Of Brown University in ’60s
